column2:
"You think you can be a Techer master?
I'll be the judge of that. That's the whole point
of the mutual evaluation system."

"Don't overthink it; just use your Techer
skills to get through the test."

"This will be harder than what you're used to,
but you just might be up to the task."
"So go ahead and try it. I'll await your report."
